mapper.select: select pro_no,pro_name, pro_price, pro_addr from project
Select count(rownum)a, SUM(pro_price)b,count(b.ro2)c from Project a,(select count(rownum) ro2 from client) b
select PRO_NO , PRO_PERIOD ,PRO_PLAN,PRO_PARTNERS,PRO_SKILL,PRO_END,PRO_ADDR,PRO_MANAGEMENT, PRO_CONTENTS,PRO_PRICE,PRO_START,PRO_NAME from project where Pro_NO = #{P_NO}

select PRO_NO,PRO_NAME,PRO_PERIOD,PRO_PRICE,PRO_PLAN,PRO_PARTNERS,PRO_SKILL,PRO_FILE,PRO_END ,PRO_ADDR,PRO_START,PRO_MANAGEMENT,PRO_CONTENTS,C_NO from project where Pro_name LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
